languages.text: "Эти люди должны были нести смерть врагам Человечества, но оказались заперты здесь. Сколько же из них погибло здесь, так и не вкусив радости битвы во имя Императора?"

traits.locale_text: "Люди стали заложниками происков варпа. Сколько же из них погибло здесь, так и не вкусив радости битвы во имя Императора?"

languages.text: "These people were supposed to bring death to enemies of Humanity, but instead, they became trapped in this place. How many of them died here without ever having experienced the bliss of doing battle in the Emperor's name?"
languages.original_text: "Эти люди должны были нести смерть врагам Человечества, но оказались заперты здесь. Сколько же из них погибло здесь, так и не вкусив радости битвы во имя Императора?"

traits.locale_text: "These people were supposed to bring death to enemies of Humanity, but instead they became trapped in this place. How many of them died here without ever having experienced the bliss of doing battle in the Emperor's name?"

"These people were supposed to bring death to enemies of Humanity, but instead they became trapped in this place. How many of them died here without ever having experienced the bliss of doing battle in the Emperor's name?"

"These people were supposed to bring death to enemies of Humanity, but instead, they became trapped in this place. How many of them died here without ever having experienced the bliss of doing battle in the Emperor's name?"
"These people have become hostages of the warp's schemes. How many of them died here without ever having experienced the bliss of doing battle in the Emperor's name?"

"These people were supposed to bring death to enemies of Humanity, but instead, they became trapped in this place. How many of them died here without ever having experienced the bliss of doing battle in the Emperor's name?"

"These people were supposed to bring death to enemies of Humanity, but instead, they became trapped in this place. How many of them died here without ever having experienced the bliss of doing battle in the Emperor's name?"

languages.text: 「彼らは本来、人類の敵に死をもたらすために送り出されたはずだった。だがその代わりに、この場所に囚われてしまった。いったい何人が、皇帝陛下の御名のもとで戦うという至福を味わうことなく、ここで命を落としたのだろう」
languages.original_text: "These people were supposed to bring death to enemies of Humanity, but instead, they became trapped in this place. How many of them died here without ever having experienced the bliss of doing battle in the Emperor's name?"

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは本来、人類の敵に死をもたらすために送り出されたはずだった。だがその代わりに、この場所に囚われてしまった。いったい何人が、皇帝陛下の御名のもとで戦うという至福を味わうことなく、ここで命を落としたのだろう」

languages.text: "Diese Leute sollten den Feinden der Menschheit den Tod bringen, wurden aber stattdessen an diesem Ort gefangen. Wie viele von ihnen sind hier gestorben, ohne jemals die Glückseligkeit erfahren zu haben, im Namen des Imperators in die Schlacht zu ziehen?"
languages.original_text: "These people were supposed to bring death to enemies of Humanity, but instead, they became trapped in this place. How many of them died here without ever having experienced the bliss of doing battle in the Emperor's name?"

traits.locale_text: "Diese Leute sollten den Feinden der Menschheit den Tod bringen, wurden aber stattdessen an diesem Ort gefangen. Wie viele von ihnen sind hier gestorben, ohne jemals die Glückseligkeit erfahren zu haben, im Namen des Imperators in die Schlacht zu ziehen?"

languages.text: « Alors qu'ils étaient censés semer la mort dans les rangs des ennemis de l'humanité, ils se sont retrouvés piégés ici. Combien d'entre eux sont morts ici sans avoir jamais connu la joie d'un combat livré au nom de l'Empereur ? »
languages.original_text: "These people were supposed to bring death to enemies of Humanity, but instead, they became trapped in this place. How many of them died here without ever having experienced the bliss of doing battle in the Emperor's name?"

traits.locale_text: « Alors qu'ils étaient censés semer la mort dans les rangs des ennemis de l'humanité, ils se sont retrouvés piégés ici. Combien d'entre eux sont morts ici sans avoir jamais connu la joie d'un combat livré au nom de l'Empereur ? »

languages.text: «Esta gente debería haber destruido a los enemigos de la Humanidad, pero, en lugar de eso, acabó atrapada aquí. ¿Cuántos habrán muerto sin haber sentido la exaltación de luchar en nombre del Emperador?».
languages.original_text: "These people were supposed to bring death to enemies of Humanity, but instead, they became trapped in this place. How many of them died here without ever having experienced the bliss of doing battle in the Emperor's name?"

traits.locale_text: «Esta gente debería haber destruido a los enemigos de la Humanidad, pero, en lugar de eso, acabó atrapada aquí. ¿Cuántos habrán muerto sin haber sentido la exaltación de luchar en nombre del Emperador?».

languages.text: “这些人本该为人类之敌带来死亡，可实际上呢？他们被困在了这个地方。他们之中有多少人，还没有体验过以帝皇之名战斗的至福，就白白死在了这里？”
languages.original_text: "These people were supposed to bring death to enemies of Humanity, but instead, they became trapped in this place. How many of them died here without ever having experienced the bliss of doing battle in the Emperor's name?"

traits.locale_text: “这些人本该为人类之敌带来死亡，可实际上呢？他们被困在了这个地方。他们之中有多少人，还没有体验过以帝皇之名战斗的至福，就白白死在了这里？”

languages.text: "'İnsanlığın düşmanlarına ölüm saçmakla mükellef olan bu insanlar, gel gör ki aksine burada kapana kısılmış. Kim bilir kaçı, İmparator adına savaşmanın saadetini tadamadan can verdi?"
languages.original_text: "These people were supposed to bring death to enemies of Humanity, but instead, they became trapped in this place. How many of them died here without ever having experienced the bliss of doing battle in the Emperor's name?"
